1370: Hille was born in Lievevrouwe kerch in 1370.
1388: Hille moved to Marcktgang.B.0 after marriage.
Got married to Diddekin at age 19 in 1388.
1375: Lost father at the age of 5.
1390: Lost sibling Hille in 1390 when Hille was 16.
Gave birth to Sywi in 1390 at age 20.
1389: Gave birth to Hollander in 1389 at age 19.
1391: Gave birth to Liudburgis in 1391 at age 21.
1392: Gave birth to Wijfgode in 1392 at age 22.
1393: Lost daughter Sywi when Sywi was 4 years old.
1396: Gave birth to Amisius in 1396 at age 26.
1398: Lost daughter Liudburgis when Liudburgis was 8 years old.
1399: Gave birth to Sybillia in 1399 at age 29.
